name: Daisy Eau de Toilette
about: Fragrance Family: Floral..Scent Type: Fruity Florals..Key Notes: Strawberry, Violet Leaves, Jasmine..About: Charmingly simple with a signature quality, Daisy Marc Jacobs transports you to a place that's optimistic, beautiful, and pure. The top of the fragrance is infused with succulent wild berries and soft white violets. At the heart, velvety jasmine warms to a dreamy dry-down of sensual sandalwood, for a romantic, lingering finish...Irresistibly feminine, Daisy Marc Jacobs is the captivating creation of master perfumer Alberto Morillas.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Water, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzophenone-3, Benzyl Benzoate, Bht, ButylMethoxydibenzoylmethane, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Methyl 2-Octynoate, Fd&C Yellow N5 (Ci 19140), Fd&C Yellow N6 (Ci 15985).

3.3 oz / 100 ml eau de toilette spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is sweet, not overpowering but distinct smell. The spray is easy to use, I had no reaction to,  and is not as messy as a dabber could be. It's comparable in price to other well known perfumes too. My personal favorite is black opium, but having a variety of scents is nice.  I feel like a lot of women I know would like it too, so it's a nice gift to give!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A good fragrance is hard to find. A good fragrance that actually works with your skin chemistry is virtually impossible to find. I've really only been able to find one signature fragrance which is fine, but sometimes you just want to mix it up. I was excited to try Marc Jacobs Daisy because of its notes. I has a light violet scent that is mild, but floral. It evokes a playful top note followed by a light airy base that lingers. It's not over the top and I get hints of it while running errands or walking around that bring a smile to my face. I'm prone to scent migraines and a huge plus for me is that this one doesn't cause headaches! I love how it's a casual scent, but also can be worn for dressier occasions and parties. The floral light airy scent is perfect for me. I hate gourmand scents and I find a lot of fragrances have that vanilla scent to them, which this does not so a huge win. Definitely a winner in my book and will be getting the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What i love the most about this scent is how long-lasting it is. I only sprayed on my left wrist in the morning once, and I was able to smell it on me until the evening of the same day. The scent, however, is the reason why I took off 1 star. I thought it would be very floral based on the packaging of the product and how the bottle looks on advertisement. To my surprised it was not floral, in my opinion. The scent is more of a clean and fresh scent that I think would be good for summer. Other than the scent not being what I was expecting, I think it's a good perfume since the scent stays on all day and doesn't change on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not the biggest floral fan but Marc Jacob's fragrance typically does florals really well. They are mixed nicely with other scents to make it a very wearable scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Daisy by Marc Jacobs Eau de Toilette is a wonderfully fresh and feminine scent that's ideal for daily use. With notes of wild strawberry, violet leaves, and jasmine, it offers a light and playful aroma that's perfectly balanced with a hint of sophistication. The fragrance is subtle enough for both casual and formal settings, making it incredibly versatile. Plus, the iconic daisy-capped bottle adds a touch of charm to any vanity. If you're a fan of floral, youthful, and uplifting scents, Daisy is definitely worth trying!

reviews.review_title: Good for daily use but not for me

However, for those who prefer more subtle or sophisticated perfumes, the sweetness of Daisy can be a bit too much for me. Overall, Daisy Marc Jacobs is a fun and feminine fragrance, but it may be better suited to those who enjoy more sugary, youthful scents. I'd give it 3 stars because while the scent is pleasant at first, it becomes too sweet for my taste as it wears on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: ufffc This Mark Jacobs fragrance was aptly named, as I've been trying to figure out a different way to say that it smells very floral. To me its scent feels like it's from soft-pink & off-white flowers, with a delicate subtleness that doesn't overpower, but instead compliments the wearer in a subtle yet noticeable way. Some floral perfumes gave a very potpourri-esque or heavy vibe that reminds you of your grandmother's house. But Daisy is one of the most fresh & clean floral perfumes that I've ever tried. Not exactly like a clean linen smell with flower notes, but  more elevated to the nth degree- it radiates youth and spring and sunshine, to me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Marc Jacobs Daisy is a timeless fragrance that feels light, fresh, and floral. It's perfect for everyday wear or a subtle touch of elegance. Here's a breakdown of my thoughts:  Fragrance Notes:  u2022 Top Notes: Wild strawberry, violet leaves, and sparkling grapefruit. The opening is bright and sweet without being overpowering.  u2022 Heart Notes: Gardenia, jasmine, and violet. These floral notes give the perfume a delicate, feminine essence.  u2022 Base Notes: Musk, vanilla, and white woods. The dry-down is warm and subtly sweet, balancing the brightness of the top and middle notes.  Longevity: Moderate. It lasts around 4u20136 hours on the skin, which is great for a light perfume but may need reapplication for longer outings.  Projection: Soft to moderate. It's not overpowering and stays close to the skin, making it suitable for intimate settings.  Packaging: The sample bottle mimics the iconic daisy-adorned full-size version. The design perfectly reflects the youthful and carefree vibe of the fragrance.  Overall: Daisy is ideal for those who prefer light, fresh florals with a hint of warmth. It's a safe, versatile choice for anyone looking for an approachable, everyday perfume.  Would I recommend? Absolutely, especially for those new to fragrances or looking for a signature scent that's classic and approachable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect spring/summer fragrance, Daisy is a lovely feminine, floral fragrance with a number of notes that stand out to me. Firstly the violet, jasmine and lavender which my nose always picks up on first, followed by wild strawberry and a hint of Grapefruit and vanilla. It's a very fresh and clean perfume and isn't overly sweet although I would still class it as a gourmand scent. On drydown I get a powdery violet, wood and musk which then proceeds to stay close to my skin for about 4-5 hours. Quite a few people have told me they think it smells like honey and ask which fragrance I'm wearing that has that lovely honey aroma. To my nose there is no detectable honey note in here so maybe it's just what it morphs into with my skin chemistry/PH, who knows? Despite the various  different notes it isn't a complex fragrance at all, in fact I'd go as far as calling it a fairly 'safe' choice when it comes to fragrances. But nevertheless I have this in the full size and spritz away, especially when the weather warms up. It's an all-rounder, works for me at any time of the day and any occasion whether heading to office or an evening out.      ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: u2018Divine Herbal' - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: u2018Peter Thomas Roth' u2013 Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: u2018Divine Herbal' - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: u2018Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: u2018Nuxe' u2013 Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: u2018Sephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When Marc Jacobs Daisy came out in 2007 it was MY fragrance obsession to end all fragrance obsessions. I (over)showered myself in the stuff daily. Went through multiple bottles a yearu2026..for years....till, as happens with too much of anything sometimes, I hit a wall with it and our love affair ended. Apart from a few sniffs at Sephora here and there, our flame has not truly been rekindled since. I have been going through somewhat of fragrance memory journey and picked this up (rollerball) on a whim with a Christmas giftcard.   As soon as I sprayed itu2026.I was immediately transported back to over a decade ago. I was in my early 20s then and I really do find this to be a very youthful, bright, sunny, bubbly, happy, borderline-fresh floral fragrance. It is sweet but not in a gourmand way at all, in anu2026.almost honey-like way if that makes sense. I love violet and while I do smell it in MC Daisy, I wish the violet note was a bit more pronounced; that being said, I still really appreciate its presence all the same. I do get a lot of other white floral notes though they are not super defined. I definitely pick up on the juicy strawberry note, and come to think of it, I think juicy is another perfect descriptive word for this perfume as well. I personally have a harder time picking up on any of the base notes (musk, woods, vanilla) and find this one to keep pretty consistent and therefore rather linear throughout its wear and it just never really gains much depth.   Longevity is average and silage is as well.   I think a large part of why I love this is, yes, for the nostalgia and memories it evokes, but it is also just a really nice, inoffensive, u201csafeu201d fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Scent, But Lasting Power is Poor
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Good: I've owned this perfume many times since its original release in 2007 but I mysteriously stopped repurchasing it. When I initially spray this on the skin I get notes of mixed floral, a stronger citrus and a touch of alcohol-which I genuinely enjoy. But this perfume really shines after it dries and mixes with my chemistry I get a wonderful, luxurious, full-bodied violet scent. It transports me to drinking wine by the countryside in a wonderfully kept garden filled with luscious violet field. Truly and classically, a sexy floral scent. I went on a perfume challenge recently and re-discovered why I liked this perfume so much back in the day, which is always a nice stroll down memory lane. The bottle is also quite gorgeous and eye-catching on a vanity, so if you're a sucker for beautiful bottles with gorgeous scents this is a classic.  The Bad: As much as I love the scent I'm incredibly disappointed by it's lasting power. As most perfumes almost fade out from the skin into a fainter version of themselves, this mysteriously disappears. Every time I use this I had to re-apply within a couple of hours and then re-apply again. I don't know if it's because it's a eau de toilette opposed to a eau de parfum or if it's something with my skin chemistry but this literally disappears without a trace... it's the strangest thing. I like a perfume that lasts at least 6 hours so I really feel like the lack of lasting power takes away from how awesome this scent is.  The Ugly/Honest: As stated, the staying power needs massive work. For a brand like Marc Jacobs, I really expect more intensity in their fragrances. I owned some of the other fragrances and don't recall any of them disappearing off my skin like this one does. Since this is the OG, I think that's a bit backwards and disappointing. The scent overall gets 4 stars but I had to knock off a star for the poor lasting power.

reviews.review_text: I love that this perfume is light, I get headaches from really wrong scents. This one though is light but still very noticeable. It smells very sweet, floral, mixed with some woodsy notes. I love floral perfumes and this is one of the better floral options. It smells so sweet, I would definitely recommend it to someone who was definitely looking for that type of a scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample for free in exchange for my honest review. I wish I had gotten a full size product because I loved it. The packaging is beautiful and the scent is a light, fresh and floral. I am considering buying a full size product with my own money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you like floral this is your perfume! Is like floral/ fresh scent and stays on you for a good 4 hours. Great for the summer months

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute favorite scent. This scent smells beautiful but also isn't too loud. A great fragrances for all outings.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really good. Would recommend. Has a fresh floral smell. However, it doesn't last super long. Mine wore off after 4 or so hours. I received this product for free from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love Daisy for the everyday, makes me feel confident and refreshed. And the packaging is gorgeous.  I have received a free sample in exchange for review, but I do own the full size which I purchased myself. Also adore Daisy Love & Daisy Dream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is nice and long lasting. I'm not a big perfume kind of person mostly because I want something that it's not too strong that it gives me a headache but I also don't want to keep reapplying. The smell to me is floral like daisies, obviously.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful perfume! I received this sample for free to review in exchange for a review. It's a light, airy, floral scent that lasts all day. I received many compliments on it when I went out, so people could smell it through the masks and enjoyed it! I personally would like this as a candle. Highly recommend to at least get a sample!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a very floral scent. It's quite strong so you don't want to use too much when applying. It has a long wear time and has a mainly fresh and floral scent. I would not buy it again. Makes me think work professional not everyday inviting scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is filled with floral scents. It smells so refreshing and clean. I would definitely recommend if you like the smell of flowers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance definitely had a strong powdery smell mixed with florals. It didn't last that long on me and the powdery smell was a bit too strong for my liking as well. It's a okay floral fragrance to wear in the spring/summertime if you like fragrances with a powdery smell. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first received my Marc Jacob's Dasiy Love VoxBox, I was really excited! After opening my small box from Influenster, I was surprised with a sample size of Daisy Eau de Toilette. After using it a few times, I'm loving this classic floral sent that never goes out of style! The timeless aroma of dancing in a field of strawberries, Jasmine and violet leaves in perfect harmony. This is a must have for all perfume consumers!  *I received this product complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample. This is a classic scent: fresh and floral, carefree vibes. However, it's not a long-lasting scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's not that it's a bad scent it's just not my preference. It's a strong powdery floral that I would imagine a posh English grandmother would wear. I prefer something more spicy.  I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review from #influenster. This opinion is my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! It's the perfect balance of fresh and floral. It's not super over powering which I really like. It's more of a spring/summer scent but I will totally still wear it this fall. I like that the small sample size is so easy to travel with also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice smelling perfume. A little goes a long way and it also lasts all day. The first day I used too much and it definitely was overbearing. In my opinion it's a unique smell, neither fruity nor spicy or musky. I enjoyed it and would purchase.

reviews.review_title: Warm but light, sweet but not too sweet.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think this scent is great for so many ages. It's fresh and light and youthful. I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of Daisy Marc Jacobs to try and the smell was very light, clean and floral. It does smell very good but the smell didn't seem to last long on my skin. I like that the smell isn't too harsh on the nose, it's very light. I would wear it again! If you like light florals, you'd probably like this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good! It has a beautiful floral smell and one spritz lasted all day!

reviews.review_title: Not the one for me but you might love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not my favorite daisy scent. It does not last long enough on me and it starts to smell strange once the middle notes set in. My favorite daisy is the eau so fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this sample in exchange for my unbiased review. This is a super floral,  flirty fragrance that is perfect for spring & summer. I am not sure if I would purchase the full size of it as it is a tad too floral for me but it is a great travel/ sample size to carry in your purse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. Smells so fresh! I also love the Daisy Eau So Fresh variety

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this perfume from Influencer. I was very excited to receive this product but in my opinion it's a little meh. It has a very nice clean smell to it with a hint of a sweet floral smell. It's a very elegant smell. My biggest issue is that it's not very long lasting. It doesn't last all day like some people have said.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been on the hunt for a new fragrance for a while. My usual scent is viva la juicy by juicy couture and I have been looking for something a little more grown up...this is it. I've been avoiding this perfume because everyone and their moms use it but now I know why! This lasts very long ans is just so amazing. Sweet, floral, and flirty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the clean aroma of this. It had a florally scent without it being overpowering. That said, you only really need one spritz for it to last all day.  Definitely annoyed the smell. Will probably end up purchasing at some point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free for testing purposes from Influenster. This scent is sweet yet floral, but not overwhelming. The classic floral notes make me feel very feminine when I put it on. Perfect for date night! Florals can sometimes give me headaches if they're too strong, but this one was just subtle enough to not affect me. I took one star off because the scent faded pretty quickly for me, but overall this gives me modern floral femme vibes. Def not your grandma's cloying perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tested a sample size of this fragrance to review. It's a solid floral scent that I think anyone who likes floral scents would love. Testing in the fall, it does feel out of place, but I think it'll be great for the spring time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a lovely scent it's sweet and floral, but not too sweet. This is definitely a perfume I would wear everyday. The only done fall is that since it is a toilette it does not last all day like a perfume can with its lighter scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent opens with a lovely floral introduction, slightly fruity. Once it dries down, that beautiful sandalwood scent comes through and lingers so pleasantly. While I do definitely enjoy this fragrance, my only complaint is that it doesn't last noticeably all day. I can still smell it on my wrists at the end of the day, but not from afar. Overall a great fragrance!  I did receive a sample product free for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this Marc Jacobs Eu De Toilette spray free in exchange for my honest review.  Daisy by Marc Jacobs features a timeless floral scent that manages to be sweet, but not overwhelming. This perfume is truly the perfect blend of sophisticated and youthful. I will definitely be purchasing a full size version for my personal use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice classic floral scent. It's not too strong but just enough that you can smell it all day. It didn't give me headaches! It's kind of a fresh and floral scent so it's nice for everyday wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smelled soo good and it lasted so long with the scent would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like this was almost too sweet and flowery for me. I like things that stand out a little more than this and I didn't think the scent lasted very long. If you want something sweet and flowery that may only last a couple hours for a date then maybe you'll enjoy this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent comes off very sweet but transforms into a lovely warm musk throughout the day. I didn't enjoy the initial scent but as I wore it out, it grew on me. It's a nice scent for people who like warm, sweet scents. It's a good everyday perfume for anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume. Smells amazing and long lasting. It's not too strong and not too floral. This is my go to spray when I'm stepping out for a night of fun or date night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A light, fresh scent that last for several hours. It's floral and sweet, where I prefer a perfume that is a bit muskier. It's perfect for everyday wear - I received several compliments from friends when I wore it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely and light floral scent. It has decent longevity. It's nothing super special but is great for every day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the smell, it's not super strong and stays on your skin for a couple hours. All flowers that you deserve! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this scent! It's light, fades off a little bit, but by End of the day you can still smell it. It's a very fresh scent; something you could wear all year round, if you wanted, but definitely reminds me more of spring time. I recommend this to anybody that's looking for a light fresh scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample to review! Just tried this sample yesterday and I have to say it smells amazing! I would say itu2018s a very warm & cozy scent and perfect for the holidays! I did notice the sandalwood scent in it. It is a pretty powerful smell and yes it did last the whole day. I would recommend this fragrance to others!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous fragrance!! Light, fresh and delicately floral. Not too heavy or sweet. Perfect for a sunny day at the beach or a picnic date in the park. I would highly recommend this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is great. I don't have anything negative to say about it. It smells wonderful and wears really well. The smell is youthful and fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a great perfume to gift! The scent is not too strong and never disappoints. This is perfect for the holiday season.

reviews.review_title: smells good but not my tipe!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I did like the smell (floral and slightly sweet) but not my type, I prefer citrus. It's strong and good for the night, the only reason of why I'm giving 4 stars it's because at least in me it oxidize a little bit, so the smell changed. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's not the type of thing I'm into. I am more of a fruity type of girl and who really loveds sweet scents. Yet, this is great whenever you're going to something fancier so a ball or evening party.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells really nice, soft and floral... but it doesn't last even half the day on me :( I know some people love this perfume so I guess it's just me. I most likely wouldn't purchase bc of that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is really lovely. The decent is fresh and feminine. The perfume lasts all day, which is really nice. It starts out floral and then has almost fruity undertones. I love that it is not overly sweet or overly floral like some perfumes. I would definitely recommend to friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is super soft and relaxing! There are hints of jasmine, violet leaves, and strawberry which makes this scent so unique. However, it does lean more on the floral side of the spectrum. It is not overpowering so it's perfect for anywhere like work or even a date night. As an eau de toilette, it isn't as long lasting as a typical perfume, so reapplying may be necessary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For the price point I wish Marc Jacobs perfumes wouldn't be the toilette formulation. The scent was just alright, very floral with no other hints of anything else. If that's what you like, you'd probably really like it! While I do like some floral this was just a little too over the top floral. I received this product free from Influenster for reviewing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of Marc Jacob's Daisy from Influenster. I was always curious to try this scent, so I was excited to have the chance. When first applied it had a nice sweet, floral scent I would have considered wearing daily. After about 10 min I could smell notes of vanilla coming through. But, after an hour in on every occasion I used it, the scent was no longer present. I never expect an eau de toilette to last all day, but not even an hour?! I don't know if it just didn't work with my body chemistry, but I will not be purchasing. I would however consider the eau de parfum if I ever have the chance to test out the staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the floral scent and I wear it everyday. It's not too strong, so it doesn't irritate me at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good! This is a very nice everyday perfume. It's long lasting and smells beautiful. It wore for multiple hours. It's a floral like sweet scent. Its light enough it can be worn every day but also a date night as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful scent for any occasion. My husband does not like scents that are too cloying or strong, and he loves this one! It's clean, floral but not sweet, and lasts all day. It's no wonder it's become a favorite!
